DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy Pilates exercise program Pelvic Floor Muscle Training ( PFMT ) protocol combine anal electrical stimulation ( AES ) muscular pressure strength pelvic floor conservative treatment urinary incontinence prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Pilates Muscle Strength Pelvic Floor Treatment Post Prostatectomy Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial include 115 individual urinary incontinence one month radical prostatectomy . One physiotherapist , experience urogynecology , responsible assessment . muscular pressure strength pelvic floor , 24-hour pad test International Consultation Incontinence Questionnaire - Short Form ( ICIQ-SF ) variable evaluate . The subject allocate one three treatment group ( G1 : Pilates ; G2 : anal electrical stimulation combine pelvic floor muscle train G3 : Control Group ) .
DOC.criteria: Volunteers 50 75 year old ; Submitted radical prostatectomy ; With complaint urinary incontinence ; That complete one month surgery ; History incontinence ; Transurethral resection prostate ; Diagnosis neurological cognitive impairment ; Subjects unable attend treatment session , due distance physical limitation .
